Birla Mandir

Naubat Pahad, Ambedkar Colony, Khairtabad, Hyderabad, Telangana 500063

Opening hours

Monday - Friday : 6:00am - 9:00pm

Saturday and Sunday : 8:00am - 10:00pm

Famous For:

 A temple dedicated to Buddha along with fresco paintings describing his life.     

Location map

Add review

Customer reviews

Arjun 16 July 2013

Best place to spend some peaceful time alone or with friends and family.

Ajay16 June 2013

Beautiful Hindu Temple surprisingly built on a small hill in a very spiritual atmosphere.

The Birla Mandir complex also houses a temple dedicated to Buddha along with fresco paintings describing his life. The temple also has separate shrines for other gods such as Shiva, Ganesh, Saraswati, Hanuman, Brahma, Lakshmi and Saibaba. In the evening, Birla Mandir presents a spectacular sight upon illumination.

If you've been and you like it - or if you don't - please leave a review to help other people just like you.
